sentences.sentence: It's the wickedest, prettiest policy ever I heard of!
sentences.translation: 这是我听说过的最恶毒、最周密的计划了！

sentences.sentence: I don't wish to work any longer for the wickedest man in England!
sentences.translation: 我不想再为英国最恶毒的人卖命！

sentences.sentence: "All humanity is one undivided and indivisible family. I cannot detach myself from the wickedest soul." Mahatma Gandhi.
sentences.translation: “所有人类皆为不可分割的一体，再邪恶的灵魂也在其中，难以分离。”圣雄甘地。
